experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
paragraphs: Contributed to the frontend client of Walmart’s B2B Next.js application and the orchestration GraphQL layer utilized by the app. Presented upcoming features in engineering forums and assisted in on-call triages

Collaborated with product, UX, and engineering teams to implement an enterprise intake UI flow. Led discussions to align feature deployment with Walmart’s Merch-Site team. Enhanced post-MVP release by migrating static pages and elements to an internal CMS, facilitating quick updates to the flow's text and image content.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
paragraphs: Implemented majority of Agrippa’s frontend features including financial model multi-form CRUD flow, user chat service using Sendbird and commercial development marketplace using React, Typescript, and Material UI.
Implemented client side API request framework using Typescript, which generated helper methods with full type definition for both query and path parameters derived from JSON schema.

Created configurable form table with capability to derive and update cell values based on user/initial data input, allow user to add/remove rows, input validation, and generation of the static rows e.g. breakdowns/footers. Table was built with Material UI, React-Number-Formatter caret engine and used React-Hook-Form to easily integrate with form submission and initialization.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
paragraphs: Worked on the frontend client of Cloudera’s Studio application. Participated in product feature ideation, expanded/mentored Studio’s UI team and collaborated with Cloudera’s engineering teams to deliver results in a fast paced development cycle.
Proposed then implemented a new frontend client architecture for per and multi tenant Studio’s applications using Vite, React, React Query, Styled-Components and TailwindCSS.

Authored a frontend library which abstracted JWT authentication, Datacoral’s client business logic such as connector/transformation CRUD and artifact monitoring into services using Typescript. Implemented 90% unit test coverage using Jest. Published multiple releases & supporting documentation to Cloudera’s internal package registry.

Led design and built a multi-tab workspace UI feature, which allowed users to manage multiple artifact types such as connectors, transformations and data preview within the same client. Implemented reusable hook pattern for tab CRUD and built session restore using Ant Design and Context API.

Significantly contributed to redesign effort of existing Datacoral’s application to match Cloudera's UX design system, rebuilt majority of existing pages/flows using Styled-Components, Storybook and TailwindCSS.

experiences.title: Member of Technical Team
paragraphs: Worked on the frontend client of Datacoral’s application. Participated in refactoring efforts of existing React codebase, wrote integration tests using Cypress and owned responsibility for building major features.

Created and maintained a reusable components library for designer/engineering staff to improve developing efficiency, component testing and UI/UX documentation using Storybook, Tachyons and Semantic UI.
Built application’s self-serve customer onboarding flow UI incorporating AWS partner solutions, customer and company-hosted options using React and Redux.
Significantly contributed to implementation of application’s add connector flow UI supporting over 10 connector types, OAuth authentication and restoring progress from draft state.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
paragraphs: Led migration of Bassett’s furniture 3D visualizer application to utilize React.js framework with Redux.js for state management using TypeScript. Integrated application’s Redux state with Babylon.js WebGL engine rendering pipeline.

Owned majority responsibility in building Bassett’s Expertsite designer site which integrated with Bassett’s live catalog, CMS and Outward’s visualizing solutions. Presented weekly progress demos to the customer.

Implemented UI features such as product search and search filters, configuration saving and loading, cross-application navigation menu. Worked directly with the UI/UX team to deliver features on short timelines.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
paragraphs: Created a multi-window application for the laboratory to log and maintain a record of blood donors, blood draws and users using NodeJS and C#.

Integrated with in house database/authentication solution to register donors and assign user roles, calculate donor’s next availability to prevent overdraw, edit and update blood draw results, and search and view users/donors based on specific parameters using NodeJS.
Assisted in the database design, the purpose of which was to create an organized and streamlined approach to storing and viewing laboratory records previously held in multiple excel & physical files.
